wikipedia_page.main: Sir Ralph Howard, 1st Baronet of Bushey Park (1801 – 15 August 1873) was an Irish Whig politician and army officer.

response: *Sir Ralph Howard, 1st Baronet (1801–1873) of the Howard baronets
* Sir Ralph Howard, 1st Baronet (1801–1873), an MP who married Charlotte Anne Fraser, the widow of Lt.-Col. Sir James John Fraser, 3rd Baronet, and only child of Daniel Craufurd, in 1837.
